ygData.subject: Crossing Paths
ygData.msgSnippet: Nighteyes pokes up from the bush. She had known this was going to happen...but seeing as how she was out numbered.... Well, if it isnt the mighty and all

Subject: Crossing Paths
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

    Nighteyes pokes up from the bush. She had known this was going to 
happen...but seeing as how she was out numbered....
    "Well, if it isnt the mighty and all powerful Killfest. Its so nice to 
see you here. Where exactly are you guys headed?" She asked, her hands raised 
above her head, weapons on the ground, and a cocky tone in her voice. 

    Megatron shook his head at Megaton. "Dont threaten me you sorry excuse 
for a clone. Come on, we need to return to base. Aerostreak, go and rendevous 
with Nighteyes. Report back on her progress."
    Aerostreak nodded and transformed into a hawlk. He soard into the sky and 
headed to Nighteyes location.

    Ominous tapped Quasar awake. The operation was over, she was now a full 
functioning Energonian. Weather or not she wanted to be one wasnt an issue. 
If she decided to leave Ominous, she wouldnt live past a week. Her Liquid 
Energon fule tank would drain, leaving her dead.
    "Wake up Quasar. We have errands to run."

    Akron saw Darkmouse...and the other bots. They had just captured another 
Predacon. She didnt understand why the Predacons were fighting amongst each 
other....but then agian she didnt understand half the things going on in the 
war.
    "Darkmouse, your going to have to come with me weather you like it or 
not..." She whispered to herself. Her hand began to glow with an Energon 
bolt...if she hit Darkmouse at the base of her neck, she could send her right 
into stasis quickly. And, she hoped, the Predacons were using Plasma guns, 
because she could absorb the plasma.
    She shot out from behinde the a tree, her hand held out in front of her, 
and blasted a bolt at Darkmouse. Eyes wide and alert, she went tense, ready 
to engage in a fight.
